Title: How to vote
Designer: Office of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress
Publisher: Zhongguo minzhu fazhi chubanshe (中国民主法制出版社)
Notes: Part of the series Elections of delegates from urban and rural districts for the new session of the National People's Congress (2011).Voting can be done individually, in polling stations, or during polling meetings.
